Food Bank.body:
It wasn't that 
long ago that our great city became
 the face of the loss of SNAP benefits. 
While many other places across the
 country also had this issue, it's a
 good reminder that you can make a 
difference. Join us and donate. 
[Cleveland Food Bank](https://support.greaterclevelandfoodbank.org/site/TR?pg=personal&px=2782648&fr_id=1280)
